bool GetNextSetOfSynchronousMeasurements (GNSS_RxData &rxDataBase, bool &endOfStreamBase, GNSS_RxData &rxDataRover, bool &endOfStreamRover, bool &isSynchronized)
 Try to sychronize the base and rover measurement sources.

Function Documentation

bool GetNextSetOfSynchronousMeasurements ( GNSS_RxData &  rxDataBase,
bool &  endOfStreamBase,
GNSS_RxData &  rxDataRover,
bool &  endOfStreamRover,
bool &  isSynchronized 
)

Try to sychronize the base and rover measurement sources.

Returns:
true if successful, false if error.
Parameters:
rxDataBase  The base station receiver data.
endOfStreamBase  A boolean that indicates if the end of the data has been reached for the base station.
rxDataRover  The rover station receiver data.
endOfStreamRover  A boolean that indicates if the end of the data has been reached for the rover station.
isSynchronized  A boolean to indicate if the base and rover are synchronized.
